attributes.action: Secure the immediate release of Gillian Gibbons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop all aid to Sudan.Kick out their diplomats and cancel all student visas. We should stand up to these bullies and despotic tyrannts, not appease them.When the country needs a Gordon of Khartoum all we have is a Gordon the Kirkcaldy.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
